home.text_support: We are looking for your support

aboutuniverserift.subtitleone: A dynamic RPG Shooter system based on active movement with the ability to use active skills.
aboutuniverserift.subtitletwo: Randomly generated dungeons, world bosses, and events on land and in water, creating a universe that's constantly changing.
aboutuniverserift.subtitlethree: Players are drawn to steampunk for its unique aesthetic, blending gears, machinery to create an alternative past.

map.description: Using advanced AI for dynamic events and NPC behaviors, Universe Rift delivers unique, interactive gameplay. Developed in Unreal Engine 5, it combines stunning visuals with our non-target combat and AI-driven quests for a fully immersive world.
